languages.text: Уралон Жестокий недолго пробыл советником при Вольном Торговце. Во время одного из совместных нечестивых молений со сво{mf|им|ей} госпо{mf|дином|жой} видение, в равной степени чудовищное и величественное, посетило его. Ужас, посетивший сердце древнего закоренелого еретика, был столь глубок и необъясним, что Уралон спешно отправился в поход. Само Око Ужаса было его целью — там он надеялся отыскать того, кто поможет ему истолковать обрушившуюся на него грезу. Суждено ли было Уралону вернуться в Простор, и вернулся бы он другом или врагом Вольного Торговца — не ведал никто.

Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. During a session of vile worship with his {mf|master|mistress}, he was struck by a vision that was equally frightening and awe-inspiring. The terror instilled in the heart of the hardened heretic was so profound and incomprehensible that Uralon promptly embarked on a journey. The Eye of Terror itself was his goal. There he hoped to find someone who could interpret the vision that had overwhelmed him. No one could say if fate would ever lead him back to the Expanse, or if the Rogue Trader would accept him if it did.
languages.original_text: Уралон Жестокий недолго пробыл советником при Вольном Торговце. traits.locale_text: Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. During one of their ungodly worships with his {mf|master|mistress}, he was struck by a vision, equally frightening and awe-inspiring. The terror that visited the heart of the long-standing heretic, was so deep and unexplainable, that Uralon promptly embarked on a journey. The Eye of Terror itself was his goal. He hoped to find someone, who will be able to interpret the vision that overwhelmed him. Was it in his fate to one day return to the Expanse? If that day was to come, will he return as a friend or as an enemy for the Rogue Trader? No one knew these answers.

languages.text: 残暴者乌拉隆担任着行商浪人的顾问，但他的任期并没有持续多久。当他与他的主人举行邪恶仪式时，他看到了某种可怕而令人敬畏的幻象。这样的景象在他心里注入了难以理解的强烈恐惧，敦促他立即踏上了自己的旅程。他出发前往恐惧之眼，希望在那里能找到答案，了解那个令他不知所措的异象的真正含义。没人知道命运是否会将他重新带回科罗努斯扩区，也没人知道如果他真的再次回到了科罗努斯扩区，行商浪人还是否会接受他。
languages.original_text: Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. During a session of vile worship with his {mf|master|mistress}, he was struck by a vision that was equally frightening and awe-inspiring. No one could say if fate would ever lead him back to the Expanse, or if the Rogue Trader would accept him if it did.

languages.text: Uralon der Grausame war nicht lange Berater {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Während einer Sitzung der schändlichen Anbetung mit {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} hatte er eine Vision, die ebenso beängstigend wie ehrfurchtgebietend war. Das Grauen im Herzen des abgehärteten Ketzers war so profund und unverständlich, dass Uralon unverzüglich zu einer Reise aufbrach. Das Auge des Schreckens selbst war sein Ziel. Er hoffte, dort jemanden zu finden, der die überwältigende Vision deuten konnte. Niemand konnte sagen, ob das Schicksal ihn je wieder zurück in die Ausdehnung führen würde oder ob {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihn dann überhaupt wieder aufnehmen würde.
languages.original_text: Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. During a session of vile worship with his {mf|master|mistress}, he was struck by a vision that was equally frightening and awe-inspiring. traits.locale_text: Uralon der Grausame war nicht lange Berater {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Während einer Sitzung der schändlichen Anbetung mit {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} hatte er eine Vision, die ebenso beängstigend wie ehrfurchtgebietend war. Das Grauen im Herzen des treuen Ketzers war so profund und unverständlich, dass Uralon unverzüglich zu einer Reise aufbrach. Das Auge des Schreckens selbst war sein Ziel. Er hoffte, dort jemanden zu finden, der die überwältigende Vision deuten konnte. Niemand konnte sagen, ob das Schicksal ihn je wieder zurück in die Ausdehnung führen würde oder ob {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihn dann überhaupt wieder aufnehmen würde.

languages.text: Uralon le Cruel ne joua pas longtemps son rôle de conseiller {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Lors d'une séance de vénération impie avec {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}, il fut assailli par une vision aussi terrifiante que spectaculaire. Celle-ci inspira une terreur si profonde et si incompréhensible à l'indéfectible hérétique qu'il entreprit immédiatement un voyage jusqu'à l'Œil de la Terreur, où il espérait trouver quelqu'un capable d'interpréter la vision qui l'avait ainsi submergé. Personne ne saurait dire si le destin le mènerait à nouveau dans les Étendues et si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} le cas échéant.
languages.original_text: Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. languages.text: Uralon el Cruel no pasó mucho tiempo como consejero de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Durante una sesión de viles oraciones con su am{mf|o|a}, recibió una visión tan espantosa como inspiradora. El pánico que afligió el corazón del veterano hereje fue tan profundo e incomprensible que Uralon partió en un viaje de inmediato. Su objetivo era el mismísimo Ojo del Terror. Allí esperaba encontrar a alguien capaz de interpretar la visión que tanto le había impactado. Era imposible saber si su destino le volvería a llevar a la Extensión o si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente le aceptaría si lo hiciera.
languages.original_text: Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. languages.text: 残酷なウラロンは自由開拓者の顧問を長く務めることはなかった。主と下劣な崇拝を行っている中、彼は同様に恐ろしく、畏敬の念を抱かせる幻視に襲われた。その屈強な異端者の心に植えつけられた恐怖はあまりにも深く、理解しがたいものであったため、ウラロンはすぐに旅に出た。恐怖の眼そのものが彼の目的だった。そこで彼は、自身を圧倒した幻視を解釈できる者を探し出したいと願った。運命が彼を再びエクスパンスに導くのか、もしそうだとしても自由開拓者が彼を受け入れるのか、それは誰にもわからないことだ。
languages.original_text: Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. During a session of vile worship with his {mf|master|mistress}, he was struck by a vision that was equally frightening and awe-inspiring. The terror instilled in the heart of the hardened heretic was so profound and incomprehensible that Uralon promptly embarked on a journey. The Eye of Terror itself was his goal. There he hoped to find someone who could interpret the vision that had overwhelmed him. No one could say if fate would ever lead him back to the Expanse, or if the Rogue Trader would accept him if it did.

languages.text: Zalim Uralon, Hür Tacir'e uzun süre danışmanlık yapmadı. Efendisiyle habis tapınma seanslarının birinde, hem korkutucu hem de ilham verici bir görü gördü. Artık hissizleşmiş olan kâfirin kabine işlenen dehşet öylesine derin ve öylesine idrak edilemez seviyedeydi ki Uralon, derhâl bir yolculuğa çıktı. Hedefi doğrudan Dehşetin Gözü idi. Orada, aklını başından alan görüyü yorumlayabilecek birini bulmayı umuyordu. Kader onu Enginlik'e geri götürecek miydi, eğer götürürse Hür Tacir onu kabul edecek miydi... İşte orasını kimse bilmiyordu.
languages.original_text: Uralon the Cruel was not an advisor to the Rogue Trader for long. During a session of vile worship with his {mf|master|mistress}, he was struck by a vision that was equally frightening and awe-inspiring. The terror instilled in the heart of the hardened heretic was so profound and incomprehensible that Uralon promptly embarked on a journey. The Eye of Terror itself was his goal. There he hoped to find someone who could interpret the vision that had overwhelmed him. No one could say if fate would ever lead him back to the Expanse, or if the Rogue Trader would accept him if it did.

traits.locale_text: Zalim Uralon, uzun süre Hür Tacir'in danışmanı olarak kalmadı. Efendisiyle birlikte gerçekleştirdiği habis tapınma seanslarının birinde, hem korkutucu hem de ilham verici bir görüye maruz kaldı. Artık hissizleşmiş olan kâfirin kabine işlenen dehşet öylesine derin ve öylesine idrak edilemez seviyedeydi ki, Uralon derhâl bir yolculuğa çıktı. Hedefi direkt olarak Dehşetin Gözü idi. Orada, aklını başından alan görüyü yorumlayabilecek birini bulmayı umuyordu. Kader onu Enginlik'e geri götürecek miydi veya götürürse Hür Tacir onu kabul edecek miydi, bunu bilebilecek kimse yoktu.
